title: The End of a Love Affair

song.full_title: The End Of A Love Affair (Faultline Mix) by Stina Nordenstam
song.title: The End Of A Love Affair (Faultline Mix)
song.title_with_featured: The End Of A Love Affair (Faultline Mix)
song.lyrics:
The End Of A Love Affair (Faultline Mix) LyricsThe end of a love affair
A scene from a film
Just as familiar
As the love had been

I woke and couldn't sleep
Before a word was said
The gap was ocean deep
Between us in the bed

The end of a love affair
The end of a life
The end of a love affair
Still we both survive
It didn't take so long
Really just a day
And all the hope was gone
It was clear I couldn't say

Getting up is easy
Beaten up, still easy
Cutting off is easy
Tearing down is easy

The end of a love affair
The world is born again
If things doesn't look the same
It's cause they constantly change

I take your number off the phone
Now I'm on my own
The good days will come
I just need the timeYou might also likeEmbed
